name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: Provides direct income support of ₹6000 annually to small and marginal farmers.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
description: Provides crop insurance to farmers against yield losses.

name: PMEGP - Prime Minister's Employment Generation Programme
description: Provides financial assistance for establishing micro-enterprises in rural and urban areas.

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana
description: Financial inclusion scheme to ensure access to banking and financial services for all households.

name: Atal Pension Yojana
description: Pension scheme for workers in unorganized sectors between ages 18 and 40.

name: Ayushman Bharat - Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana
description: Provides ₹5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.

name: Ujjwala Yojana
description: Provides free LPG connections to women from BPL households.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Gramin
description: Provides financial assistance for constructing houses in rural areas.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Urban
description: Affordable housing for urban poor and middle-income groups.

name: Stand-Up India Scheme
description: Provides loans to SC/ST and women entrepreneurs to start new enterprises.

name: PM Street Vendor’s Atmanirbhar Nidhi (PM SVANidhi)
description: Micro-credit scheme for street vendors to resume businesses post COVID-19.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana
description: Free skill training for youth to enhance employability.

name: National Means-cum-Merit Scholarship Scheme
description: Scholarship for meritorious students from economically weaker sections.

name: Khelo India Scheme
description: Encourages sports development among students and youth across India.

name: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS)
description: Promotes apprenticeship training and provides financial incentives.

name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana
description: Skill training and placement opportunities for rural youth.

name: Kanya Sumangala Yojana (UP)
description: Financial aid to girl children for education and welfare in Uttar Pradesh.

name: YSR Rythu Bharosa (Andhra Pradesh)
description: Income support to farmers in Andhra Pradesh.

name: Rythu Bandhu (Telangana)
description: Investment support for farmers for each crop season.

name: Karunya Health Scheme (Kerala)
description: Financial support for poor families for treatment of critical illnesses.

name: Amma Two-Wheeler Scheme (Tamil Nadu)
description: Provides 50% subsidy on scooters to working women in Tamil Nadu.

name: Majhi Kanya Bhagyashree Scheme (Maharashtra)
description: Promotes girl child welfare by providing financial support to families.

name: Vahali Dikri Yojana (Gujarat)
description: Provides financial support to girls for education and marriage.

name: Mukhyamantri Kisan Sahay Yojana (Gujarat)
description: Provides financial assistance to farmers for crop losses due to natural calamities.

name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
description: Savings scheme for girl children to promote education and marriage security.

name: National Handicapped Finance and Development Corporation Scheme
description: Financial assistance for self-employment among differently-abled persons.

name: National Social Assistance Programme
description: Provides pension to elderly, widows, and disabled persons from BPL households.

name: National Scholarship Scheme
description: Provides financial assistance to meritorious students from OBC, SC, and ST communities for higher education.

name: Central Sector Scheme of Scholarships for College and University Students
description: Provides scholarships to meritorious students from low-income families to meet day-to-day expenses while pursuing higher education.

name: Post Matric Scholarship for SC Students
description: Offers financial assistance to Scheduled Caste students studying at post-secondary or post-matriculation levels.

name: Post Matric Scholarship for OBC Students
description: Supports Other Backward Class students for studies at post-secondary levels with tuition and maintenance allowance.

name: AICTE Pragati Scholarship for Girls
description: Scholarship scheme to empower girl students pursuing technical education through AICTE-approved institutions.

name: AICTE Saksham Scholarship for Differently Abled Students
description: Financial assistance for differently abled students pursuing technical education in AICTE-approved institutions.

name: INSPIRE Scholarship for Higher Education (SHE)
description: Encourages students to pursue careers in science by offering scholarships to top-performing students in science streams.

name: National Fellowship and Scholarship for Higher Education of ST Students
description: Provides financial support to Scheduled Tribe students for pursuing higher education such as MPhil and PhD.

name: Maulana Azad National Fellowship for Minority Students
description: Supports students from minority communities pursuing MPhil and PhD degrees across India.

name: Padho Pardesh Scheme
description: Provides interest subsidy on educational loans for overseas studies to students from minority communities.

name: National Overseas Scholarship Scheme
description: Provides financial assistance to SC, ST, and OBC students for pursuing higher education abroad.

name: AICTE Pragati Scholarship
description: Scholarship for girl students pursuing technical education.

name: SMILE - Support for Marginalized Individuals for Livelihood and Enterprise
description: Centrally sponsored scheme for transgender persons and beggars providing skill development, education, and shelter.

name: Garima Greh Scheme
description: Provides safe shelter homes and social security for transgender individuals.

name: National Portal for Transgender Persons
description: Online application for identity cards and certificates for transgender persons.

name: Maharashtra Transgender Welfare Board
description: Supports skill training, health, and livelihood programs for transgender citizens.

name: Tamil Nadu Transgender Pension Scheme
description: Monthly pension for transgender individuals aged above 40 living in Tamil Nadu.

name: Kerala Transgender Policy Implementation
description: State-level policy ensuring education, healthcare, and employment rights for transgender people.

name: Odisha Transgender Empowerment Scheme
description: Grants and training for self-employment and livelihood for transgender individuals.

name: West Bengal Manabik Scheme for Transgender Persons
description: Monthly allowance for transgender individuals for basic welfare and dignity.

name: Telangana Transgender Loan Scheme
description: Offers loans to transgender entrepreneurs through self-help groups.

name: Delhi Transgender Welfare Scheme
description: Provides housing, education, and medical assistance to transgender individuals in Delhi.
